name: Silence
flavorText: Straining both your patience and your keen ears, you hear nothing in the duke’s private chamber. That’s why you’re so surprised to see the duke when you boldly enter.
text: You ward a single room (or a burst 4 area), against eavesdropping. Creatures attempting to listen to something in the warded area from outside the area take a –10 penalty to their Perception checks.
